  Players must complete a structured set of survival and crafting tasks while learning to use coding tools to assist or automate gameplay.

  - **ISTE Standards for Students:**  
    - Empowered Learner (using technology to achieve goals).

- **Overall educational theme:**  
  *“Hour of AI”* serves as a **guided introduction to coding and artificial intelligence within a familiar Minecraft survival context.** It blends hands-on resource management with digital problem-solving, encouraging computational thinking and creativity through interactive play.

**Summary:**  
This language file defines the instructional and interface text for *Hour of AI*, a Minecraft Education experience that uses the “First Night” survival tutorial structure to teach coding fundamentals and introduce AI concepts.
